message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good next round!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a good deal for both of us. Don't get greedy!
I'm still not convinced by your offers, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome.  Take it before inflation eats away at the value!
